name: Dream Family Sim: Mother Story
description:
Let us welcome to your own virtual family in a 3D game world where you can play as a mother a father & as well as a school girl. you can go to shopping and buy decoration pieces & painting for your house, drop your baby girl at school, and pick her up. and prepare dinner for your family.

Features of Dream Family life simulator: mother story
-amusing sounds effects.
-high quality graphics.
-driving and shopping mall missions.
-big city environment
-traffic and civilians included in town.
